hero.name: Omar Gawdat
hero.heading: Hello! I'm Omar
hero.description: With 3 years of experience in backend development and AWS, I specialize in building scalable, efficient server-side solutions. I focus on creating robust systems and architectures following best practices. My passion lies in solving complex problems and optimizing cloud infrastructures to deliver high-performance, cutting-edge backend solutions.

about.title: I SPECIALIZE IN BACKEND ENGINEERING AND AWS SOLUTIONS
about.description: With 3 years of experience in backend development and AWS technologies, I excel in building scalable, efficient server-side solutions. My expertise lies in designing robust systems and architectures following industry best practices. I'm passionate about solving complex problems, optimizing cloud infrastructures, and delivering high-performance backend solutions that drive business growth. From developing RESTful APIs to managing containerized applications, I'm committed to creating innovative backend systems that meet and exceed client expectations.

details.title: Bank Currency Price Scraper
details.description:
Developed a web scraping application to collect and analyze currency exchange rates from multiple banks. The project automates the process of gathering up-to-date currency prices, providing valuable insights for financial analysis and decision-making.

The application uses advanced web scraping techniques to extract data from various bank websites, processes the information, and presents it in a user-friendly format for easy comparison and analysis.

details.title: Comprehensive Mental Health Tracking and Analysis App
details.description:
Developed an innovative mental health application that combines mood tracking, stress analysis, and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) techniques. The app utilizes machine learning algorithms to provide personalized insights and recommendations.

Key features include daily mood logging, stress level assessment, CBT exercises, and data visualization for tracking progress over time. The app aims to empower users with tools for better mental health management and self-awareness.

details.title: Luxury Yacht Rental Marketplace for Saudi Arabia
details.description:
Developed a comprehensive yacht rental platform tailored for the Saudi Arabian market. The application serves two distinct user types: customers looking to rent yachts and yacht providers offering their vessels.

Key features include an intuitive booking system, detailed yacht listings with high-quality images, real-time availability calendar, secure payment processing, and a review system. The platform also incorporates Arabic language support and adheres to local regulations and customs.

details.title: Home Services Booking App for Customers
details.description:
Developed a user-friendly mobile application for customers to easily book various home services. The app streamlines the process of finding and hiring skilled professionals for tasks such as cleaning, plumbing, electrical work, and more.

Key features include service browsing with categories, real-time availability checking, instant booking, in-app messaging with service providers, secure payment processing, and a rating system for completed services.

details.title: Home Services Management App for Service Providers
details.description:
Created a comprehensive mobile application for home service providers to manage their business and connect with customers. This app empowers professionals to offer their services, manage bookings, and grow their client base efficiently.

Key features include profile creation and service listing, real-time job notifications, schedule management, in-app communication with customers, navigation to job locations, digital invoicing, and earnings tracking.

details.title: Cargo Shipping Booking App for Customers
details.description:
Developed a user-friendly mobile application for Eramex, allowing customers to easily book vehicles for shipping their cargo. The app simplifies the process of arranging shipments and tracking deliveries.

Key features include vehicle selection based on cargo size, real-time pricing, booking management, shipment tracking, in-app messaging with drivers, digital documentation, and delivery confirmation.

details.title: Cargo Shipping Management App for Providers
details.description:
Created a comprehensive mobile application for Eramex shipping providers to manage their fleet and handle customer shipments efficiently. This app empowers drivers and fleet managers to streamline their operations and provide excellent service.

Key features include real-time order notifications, route optimization, cargo space management, digital manifests and waybills, in-app navigation, proof of delivery capture, and earnings tracking.

allService.title: API Development
allService.subTitle: Design and implement robust, scalable RESTful APIs using best practices for efficient data communication and integration.

allService.title: System Dashboards
allService.subTitle: Develop intuitive and powerful admin panels to manage applications, users, and data with enhanced security and usability.

allService.title: Machine Learning
allService.subTitle: Integrate machine learning models into backend systems for data analysis, predictions, and intelligent decision-making capabilities.

allService.title: Cloud Infrastructure
allService.subTitle: Architect and deploy robust AWS-based cloud solutions for optimal performance, scalability, and cost-efficiency.

allExperience.companyDescription: Eramsoft is a leading software development company specializing in innovative solutions. As a Backend and DevOps Engineer, I design and implement scalable backend systems, manage cloud infrastructure, and streamline deployment processes. My role involves working with cutting-edge technologies to deliver high-performance, reliable software solutions.

Algoriza is a dynamic tech company focused on developing advanced software solutions. As a Software Developer, I contributed to various projects, honing my skills in backend development and expanding my knowledge of software architecture. I worked on optimizing database queries, implementing RESTful APIs, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver robust applications.

Working on remote tasks for AI model training, I gained valuable experience in machine learning and data processing. This role involved preparing and cleaning datasets, training machine learning models, and evaluating model performance. It provided a strong foundation in AI and data science, which has been beneficial in my subsequent roles in software development.

Codeforces is a leading platform for competitive programming. During this period, I dedicated myself to improving my algorithmic problem-solving skills and coding efficiency. I achieved the rank of Specialist and solved over 1,000 problems, covering a wide range of algorithms and data structures. This experience significantly enhanced my analytical thinking and coding proficiency, laying a strong foundation for my professional software development career.
